The first impulse is based on a lot of noble but wishful thinking, the second one is rooted in hard historical experience and wisdom culled from it in the light of what unchecked state power has repeatedly resulted in eventually. Take your pick and suffer the consequences. 3/x

That is not to say we shouldn't do everything reasonable to keep guns away from the criminals and mentally unstable. We should. But we must balance it against the self-defense rights of the law-abiding, who are the overwhelming majority, and not treat them same as criminals.
